mapper.insert: insert into app_table (appid, createtime, modifytime, shortdesc, provider, appname, applicationType, appIntroduction, downloadcount, affinity, industry, contact, userid, username, score) VALUES (#{appId}, (select now()), (select now()), #{shortDesc},#{provider}, #{appName}, #{applicationType}, #{appIntroduction}, #{downloadCount}, #{affinity}, #{industry},#{contact}, #{userId}, #{userName}, 5.0)

insert into catalog_package_table (versionID, packageAddress,iconAddress, size, fileStructure, CREATETIME, SHORTDESC, appName, version, applicationType, markdowncontent, affinity, industry, contact, appid, userid) VALUES (#{versionID}, #{packageAddress}, #{iconAddress}, #{size}, #{fileStructure},(select now()),#{shortDesc}, #{appName}, #{version}, #{applicationType}, #{markDownContent},#{affinity}, #{industry}, #{contact}, #{appId},#{userId})
mapper.select: select * from catalog_package_table where appid = #{appId} limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select count(*) FROM catalog_package_table where appid = #{appId} limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from app_table where userid = #{userId}
